com.kevalpatel2106.emoticongifkeyboard.emoticons

Interface EmoticonProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Android7EmoticonProvider, Android8EmoticonProvider, EmojidexEmoticonProvider, EmojiOneEmoticonProvider, FacebookEmoticonProvider, HtcEmoticonProvider, IosEmoticonProvider, LGEmoticonProvider, MessengerEmoticonProvider, SamsungEmoticonProvider, TwitterEmoticonProvider, Windows10EmoticonProvider, Windows8EmoticonProvider

    public interface EmoticonProvider
    Created by Keval Patel on 20/08/17. Custom emoticon icon provider to display custom emoticon images instead of system emoticons.
    Author:
    'https://github.com/kevalpatel2106'

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getIcon(String unicode)
      Get the drawable resource for the given unicode.
      boolean hasEmoticonIcon(String unicode)
      Check if the icon pack contains the icon image for given unicode/emoticon?

    • Method Detail

      • getIcon

        @DrawableRes
int getIcon(String unicode)
        Get the drawable resource for the given unicode.
        Parameters:
        unicode - Unicode for which icon is required.
        Returns:
        Icon drawable resource id or -1 if there is no drawable for given unicode.

      • hasEmoticonIcon

        boolean hasEmoticonIcon(String unicode)
        Check if the icon pack contains the icon image for given unicode/emoticon?
        Parameters:
        unicode - Unicode to check.
        Returns:
        True if the icon found else false.
